attributes.action: Take legal steps to prevent David Cameron from compensating convicts who have been denied the right to vote.
attributes.additional_details: We all know he considers it good for us for our money to be used (BY HIM) to compensate people who he considers have been wronged by us and despite the European Courts declaring there is no need for compensation, he will feel obliged to award it anyway, after all, it's not his money, is it?  You MUST take steps to stop him, he cannot help himself he is mentally debilitated by his hubris.  We taxpayers MUST be protected from him.
